values.label: Carrier loads
values.comment: The cargo is loaded in the equipment by the carrier.

values.label: Full loads
values.comment: Container to be stuffed or stripped under responsibility and for account of the shipper or the consignee.

values.label: Less than full loads
values.comment: Container to be stuffed and stripped for account and risk of the carrier.

values.label: Shipper loads
values.comment: The cargo is loaded in the equipment by the shipper.

values.label: To be delivered
values.comment: The cargo is to be delivered as instructed.

values.label: To be kept
values.comment: The cargo is to be retained awaiting further instructions.

values.label: Transhipment allowed
values.comment: Transhipment of goods is allowed.

values.label: Transhipment not allowed
values.comment: Transhipment of goods is not allowed.

values.label: Partial shipment allowed
values.comment: Partial shipment is allowed.

values.label: Partial shipment not allowed
values.comment: Partial shipment is not allowed.

values.label: Partial shipment and/or drawing allowed
values.comment: Partial shipment and/or drawing is allowed.

values.label: Partial shipment and/or drawing not allowed
values.comment: Partial shipment and/or drawing is not allowed.

values.label: Carrier unloads
values.comment: The cargo is to be unloaded from the equipment by the carrier.

values.label: Shipper unloads
values.comment: The cargo is to be unloaded from the equipment by the shipper.

values.label: Consignee unloads
values.comment: The cargo is to be unloaded from the equipment by the consignee.

values.label: Consignee loads
values.comment: The cargo is to be loaded in the equipment by the consignee.

values.label: Exclusive usage of equipment
values.comment: Usage of the equipment is reserved for exclusive use.

values.label: Non exclusive usage of equipment
values.comment: Usage of the equipment is not reserved for exclusive use.

values.label: Direct delivery
values.comment: Consignment for direct delivery to the consignee.

values.label: Direct pick-up
values.comment: Consignment for direct pick-up from the consignee.

values.label: Request for delivery advice services
values.comment: The service provider is requested to advise about delivery.

values.label: Do not arrange customs clearance
values.comment: Indication that the recipient of the message is not to arrange customs clearance.

values.label: Arrange customs clearance
values.comment: Indication that the recipient of the message is to arrange customs clearance.

values.label: Check container condition
values.comment: Condition of the container is to be checked.

values.label: Damaged containers allowed
values.comment: Damaged containers are allowed.

values.label: Dirty containers allowed
values.comment: Dirty containers are allowed.

values.label: Fork lift holes not required
values.comment: Container needs not to be equipped with pocket holes, but they are allowed.

values.label: Fork lift holes required
values.comment: Container must be equipped with pocket holes.

values.label: Insure goods during transport
values.comment: Indication that the recipient of the message is to insure the goods during transport.

values.label: Arrange main-carriage
values.comment: Indication that the recipient of the message is to arrange the main-carriage.

values.label: Arrange on-carriage
values.comment: Indication that the recipient of the message is to arrange the on-carriage.

values.label: Arrange pre-carriage
values.comment: Indication that the recipient of the message is to arrange the pre-carriage.

values.label: Report container safety convention information
values.comment: Indication that the information on the Container Safety Convention plate (CSC-plate) should be reported.

values.label: Check seals
values.comment: Sealing up of the container is to be checked.

values.label: Container must be clean
values.comment: Container is to be released or delivered clean.

values.label: Request for proof of delivery
values.comment: The service provider is requested to provide proof of delivery.

values.label: Request for Customs procedure
values.comment: The service provider is requested to perform Customs procedure.

values.label: Request for administration services
values.comment: The service provider is requested to perform administration services.

values.label: Transport insulated under Intercontainer INTERFRIGO conditions
values.comment: Insulated transport under Intercontainer INTERFRIGO (joint European railways agreement) conditions.

values.label: Transport mechanically refrigerated under Intercontainer INTERFRIGO conditions
values.comment: Mechanically refrigerated transport under Intercontainer INTERFRIGO (joint European railways agreement) conditions.

values.label: Cool or freeze service, not under Intercontainer INTERFRIGO conditions
values.comment: Cool or freeze service not under Intercontainer INTERFRIGO (joint European railways agreement) conditions.

values.label: Transhipment overseas
values.comment: Transport equipment is to be transferred overseas.

values.label: Station delivery
values.comment: The specified equipment destination station is also the place of delivery of the goods.

values.label: Non station delivery
values.comment: The specified equipment destination station is not the place of delivery of the goods.

values.label: Cleaning or disinfecting
values.comment: The service required is cleaning or disinfection.

values.label: Close ventilation valve
values.comment: The ventilation valve of the equipment must be closed.

values.label: Consignment held for pick-up
values.comment: The consignment is to be held until it is picked up.

values.label: Refrigeration unit check
values.comment: Refrigeration unit has to be checked.

values.label: Customs clearance at arrival country by carrier
values.comment: The carrier is to arrange customs clearance in the arrival country.

values.label: Customs clearance at departure country by carrier
values.comment: The carrier is to arrange customs clearance in the departure country.

values.label: Heating for live animals
values.comment: Heating for live animals has to be provided.

values.label: Goods humidification
values.comment: Humidification of the goods has to be performed.

values.label: Ensure load is secure
values.comment: The load must be checked for correct stowage.

values.label: Open ventilation valve
values.comment: The ventilation valve of the equipment must be opened.

values.label: Phytosanitary control
values.comment: Phytosanitary control to be performed.

values.label: Tare check by carrier
values.comment: Carrier must check the tare of the equipment and attached items.

values.label: Temperature check
values.comment: The temperature must be checked.

values.label: Weighing of goods
values.comment: The goods have to be weighed.

values.label: Escort
values.comment: An escort is required.

values.label: No escort
values.comment: An escort is not required.

values.label: Request for berthing services
values.comment: Request for berthing services at a specific berth in the port area.

values.label: Request for planned berth consideration
values.comment: Request to take into account the planned next berth(s) in the port area.

values.label: Request for inbound passing services through port area
values.comment: Request for passing services through port area for an inbound voyage (from sea to hinterland) without requesting berth in the port area.

values.label: Request for outbound passing services through port area
values.comment: Request for passing services through port area for an outbound voyage (from hinterland to sea) without requesting berth in the port area.

values.label: Neutral delivery
values.comment: No specific delivery services required other then the agreed.

values.label: Early delivery
values.comment: Delivery which should take place early on a specified date.
